modules.name: _school__autorun
modules.script:
ensure_empty_pk("subjects_groups")
ensure_empty_pk("students")
ensure_empty_pk("subjects")
ensure_empty_pk("teachers")
ensure_empty_pk("timesheet")
ensure_empty_pk("rooms")

modules.name: _school__e_control
_school_checkin

forms.name: _school_subjects
forms.title: Предметы

lines.label: Расписание
lines.related: concat(name, " Учитель:",  (select name from teachers where teachers.tch=timesheet.tch))
lines.name: _school_students_subjects

actions.name: _school__dbanken_kontobewegung
_school_sheet_keys
actions.action_worker:
if self.heap.gd is None: q2mess("Соединение с сервисами Гугл не установлено!
Проверьте настройки") return sheet = mem.heap.load_docs_row() import _school_checkin checkin(sheet)
